title: Joining Technologies (2016) (Pdf) Gooner
description:
Joining Technologies (2016) (Pdf) Gooner

Publisher: ITexLi 2016
Language: English
ISBN: 9535125974 9535125966

This book covers a wide range of topics, from arc welding (GMAW and GTAW), FSW, laser and hybrid welding, and magnetic pulse welding on metal joining to the application of joining technologies for textile products. 

Joining and welding are two of the most important processes in manufacturing. 
These technologies have vastly improved and are now extensively used in numerous industries. 
The analysis of temperature and phase transformation is also incorporated. This book also discusses the issue of dissimilar joint between metal and ceramic, as well as the technology of diffusion bonding. 

Contents:

Preface:

1. Introductory Chapter: A Brief Introduction to Joining and Welding 
2. New Approaches to the Friction Stir Welding of Aluminum Alloys 
3. A Mesh-Free Solid-Mechanics Approach for Simulating the Friction Stir-Welding Process 
4. Gas Tungsten Arc Welding with Synchronized Magnetic Oscillation 
5. A Comprehensive Model of the Transport Phenomena in Gas Metal Arc Welding 
6. The Analysis of Temporary Temperature Field and Phase Transformations in One-Side Butt-Welded Steel Flats 
7. Laser and Hybrid Laser-Arc Welding 
8. Current Issues and Problems in the Joining of Ceramic to Metal 
9. Diffusion Bonding: Influence of Process Parameters and Material Microstructure 
10. Applying Heat for Joining Textile Materials 
11. Magnetic Pulse Welding: An Innovative Joining Technology for Similar and Dissimilar Metal Pairs
